channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.description: People whose concept of ancient history is the first series of Star Trek may be treated with patience, because it's usually not their fault they were reduced to getting their education from school. - Terry Pratchett, alt.books.pratchett
"Today Is A Good Day For Someone Else To Die!" - Terry Pratchett, Feet of Clay
